instruction: Create a persuasive argument in support of the following proposal.
input: Implementing solar energy for local businesses.
output: Local businesses are integral to the success of the economy, but many are struggling to keep their costs low. Solar energy could be an effective way for businesses to reduce their energy costs while also reducing environmental impact. Solar energy is renewable, affordable and accessible, meaning it can be incorporated into any business. By investing in solar energy, businesses will be able to create a healthier and more sustainable future.
